plot: Mrs. Meinhart is in the hospital after her collapse. Dr. Frank Ullrich looks after her. Elke spends the evening with Julia Backhoff and the two customers at the 'Carltons'. When her 'colleague' leaves with her companion, Elke stays behind. She is happy when she meets Vera and Heiko Richter in the restaurant and can let them take her with her. Her 'customer' loudly expresses his displeasure with her behavior. The next day, Elke talks to Julia and announces her decision to quit Lilo. Heiko bursts into the office and demands that Patrick keep his hands off Tina.
